history.content:
SportVue is a sports-technology company building an array of affordable, smart training aids to bring personalized, data-driven training to amateur athletes. 

Our product focuses on data-driven heads-up training for ice hockey to reduce the risk of concussion and improve performance. We plan to build similar products to football, soccer, basketball, and lacrosse in the near future. We are currently focusing on mobile development and sales. 

If you're interested in working with a small, fast-paced team this fall, please let us know here.
history.subject: Join a SportsTech startup
